explains: vt. 重建；改造；修复；重现

sentences.en: The government must reconstruct the shattered economy.
sentences.cn: 政府必须重建垮掉的经济。

sentences.en: She actually wanted to reconstruct the state and transform society.
sentences.cn: 她其实想改造这个国家并完全改变社会。

sentences.en: Investigators are trying to reconstruct the circumstances of the crash.
sentences.cn: 调查人员正试图重现撞车时的情形。
